DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy , safety economical benefit Cyclical Topical Wound Oxygen ( TWO2 ) Therapy treatment chronic diabetic foot ulcer . All subject wear standardized off-loading device use advance moist wound therapy ( AMWT ) dressing . Half subject use TWO2 device , half use sham device .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy , Safety Economic Benefits Topical Wound Oxygen Therapy Treatment Chronic Diabetic Foot Ulcers
